display_long_description:
Ready to go full monke?

Gorilla Game throws you back to the chaotic, hilarious early days of VR. It's all about mastering that unique, hand-based , climbing, and flinging yourself off surfaces to rule the trees.

But this isn't just a solo climb. This is a social game. Hop into a loud public lobby or set up a private room with your crew. It’s all about reliving that wild energy—juking other monkes, screaming with your team, or just hanging out in the forest. It’s pure, simple, social fun.

Test your skills across a bunch of wild game modes:

Infection: The classic tag game. Run, hide, and try not to get caught. Spread the fun (and the fear!) across different maps like the tricky Caves and the high-flying Clouds.

Zone Tag: Think Echo VR, but with gravity. It's an intense, team-based battle to grab the ball and slam it into the other team's goal. Get ready to make some serious plays.

Capture the Flag: Pure team-based chaos. Snatch their flag, get it back to your base, and try not to get tagged on the way.

Fireball Monke: It's PvP, but with... well, fireballs. Dodge, dip, and blast the other monkes.

Bomb Tag: A high-stakes game of hot potato. The timer's ticking! don't be the one holding the bomb when it blows!

Challenges: Test your parkour! Jump into modes like Orion Drift or other custom challenges. The goal is simple: collect all the cubes and do not touch the kill blocks.

Custom Maps: Tired of the official maps? Jump into the in-game map builder to create your own!
